parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of zone size distribution as defined by swZoneSizeDistribution_e

parameters.name: Rows
parameters.description: Number of zone rows; valid only if Type is swZoneSizeDistribution.swZoneSizeDistribution_EvenlySized

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Number of zone columns; valid only if Type is swZoneSizeDistribution.swZoneSizeDistribution_EvenlySized

title: ISheet.SetZoneSizeDistribution
signature:
System.Boolean SetZoneSizeDistribution( 
   System.Int32
Type
,
   System.Int32
Rows
,
   System.Int32
Column
)

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of zone size distribution as defined by swZoneSizeDistribution_e

parameters.name: Rows
parameters.description: Number of zone rows; valid only if Type is swZoneSizeDistribution.swZoneSizeDistribution_EvenlySized

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Number of zone columns; valid only if Type is swZoneSizeDistribution.swZoneSizeDistribution_EvenlySized

returns: True if zone size distribution successfully set, false if not
